Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to acknowledging that the institution of slavery was an appalling tragedy in the history of this state
Summary: Relates to acknowledging that the institution of slavery was an appalling tragedy in the history of this state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 137 of the laws of 1817 relating to slaves and servants, in relation to acknowledging the tragedy of slavery in New York state
